short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A smart extension to help you look out for biased information online. Go to a news website and click the extension icon to try it.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Internet is full of biased content. It's impossible to avoid. Our goal with MonkeLearn is to help consumers enjoy objective, unbiased information and be warned of less ideal sources.

Features include:
•  Scan news articles to identify biased phrases
•  See info on the political lean of websites
•  Right-click images to search for articles on the web with related images
